param.name: foundation_file
param.dialogReference: Foundation DEM layer or path to foundation data file.

param.name: aoi_file
param.dialogReference: Area of interest DEM layer or path to area of interest data file.

param.name: min_resolution
param.dialogReference: Minimum allowable registration pipeline data resolution. Smaller values increase accuracy, but also computation time.

param.name: dsm_solve_scale
param.dialogReference: Flag to include or exclude scale from the solved coarse registration transformation.

param.name: icp_solve_scale
param.dialogReference: Flag to include or exclude scale from the solved fine registration transformation.

param.name: dsm_strong_filter
param.dialogReference: Standard deviation of the large Gaussian filter used to normalize the DSM prior to feature extraction. Larger values allow longer wavelength vertical features to pass through into the normalized DSM.

param.name: dsm_weak_filter
param.dialogReference: Standard deviation of the small Gaussian filter used to normalize the DSM prior to feature extraction. Larger values increasingly blur short wavelength vertical features in the normalized DSM.

param.name: dsm_akaze_threshold
param.dialogReference: AKAZE feature detection response threshold. Larger values require increasingly distinctive local geometry for a feature to be detected.

param.name: dsm_lowes_ratio
param.dialogReference: Feature matching relative strength control. Larger values allow weaker matches relative to the next best match.

param.name: dsm_ransac_max_iter
param.dialogReference: Maximum number of iterations allowed in the RANSAC algorithm that filters the putative feature matches.

param.name: dsm_ransac_threshold
param.dialogReference: Maximum residual error for a matched feature pair to be included in a RANSAC solution to a 3D registration transformation. Larger values include matched feature pairs with increasingly greater disagreement with the solution.

param.name: icp_max_iter
param.dialogReference: Maximum number of iterations allowed in the iterative closest point (ICP) algorithm

param.name: icp_angle_threshold
param.dialogReference: ICP convergence criterion: minimum change in Euler angle between iterations.

param.name: icp_distance_threshold
param.dialogReference: ICP convergence criterion: minimum change in translation between iterations.

param.name: icp_rmse_threshold
param.dialogReference: ICP convergence criterion: minimum relative change between iterations in the root mean squared error.

param.name: icp_robust
param.dialogReference: Flag to include or exclude robust weighting in the fine registration solution.
